mapper.select: SELECT tg.id, tg.goods_name, tg.goods_detail, tg.goods_img, tg.goods_price, tg.goods_stock, tg.goods_title, tsg.seckill_price, tsg.stock_count, tsg.start_date, tsg.end_date FROM t_goods tg LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods tsg ON tg.id = tsg.goods_id

SELECT tg.id, tg.goods_name, tg.goods_detail, tg.goods_img, tg.goods_price, tg.goods_stock, tg.goods_title, tsg.seckill_price, tsg.stock_count, tsg.start_date, tsg.end_date FROM t_goods tg LEFT JOIN t_seckill_goods tsg ON tg.id = tsg.goods_id where tsg.goods_id=#{goods_id}
